programme.title: La famille des collines
programme.desc:

programme.title: Father Brown
programme.desc:
(S05EP06) Father Brown is summoned by prisoner Katherine Corven, convicted of killing her husband, who admits that she is planning to murder her lover Raymond Worrall. However he is unable to tell anybody because of the seal of the confession.
Année : 2013
Avec : Mark Williams (Father Brown) Hugo Speer (Inspector Valentine) Sorcha Cusack (Mrs. McCarthy) Kasia Koleczek (Susie Jasinski) Nancy Carroll (Lady Felicia) Alex Price (Sid Carter) Keith Osborn (Sgt. Allbright)

programme.title: La petite maison dans la prairie
programme.desc:
(S03EP03) Laura (Melissa Gilbert) and her horse, Bunny, are picked to win at the horse race in town. Since Mrs. Oleson (Katherine MacGregor) doesn't want Laura to win, she buys a great thoroughbred for Nellie (Alison Arngrim) to ride.
Année : 2013
Réalisation : William F. Claxton
Scénario : John V. Hanrahan
Avec : Walter Brooke (Sandler) Carl Pitti (Carl)

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc:
(S03EP02) A music producer is found dead in his panic room. Stottlemeyer: Ted Levine. Disher: Jason Gray-Stanford. Monk: Tony Shalhoub.
Année : 2002
Réalisation : Jerry Levine
Scénario : David Breckman Joe Toplyn
Avec : Carmen Electra (Chloe Blackburn) Stewart Finlay-McLennan (Ian Blackburn) Willie Garson (Leo Navarro) Brad Hawkins (Kurt Wolff)

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S05EP06) When the inventor of a revolutionary new kind of battery is murdered, Murdoch is led to suspect his nemesis, James Pendrick, the eccentric entrepreneur with whom he has crossed swords on several occasions.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (William Murdoch) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree) Lachlan Murdoch (Higgins) Georgina Reilly (Dr. Emily Grace) Arwen Humphreys (Margaret Brackenreid) Peter Stebbings (James Pendrick) Jerry Getty (Douglas Meadows) Zachary Bennett (Alexander Wallensky) Tannis Burnett (Mavis Chalmers) Todd Hofley (Henry Ford)

programme.title: Elle écrit au meurtre
programme.desc:
(S08EP21) Jessica intervenes when a long-lost Army buddy of her friend Seth is accused of murder.
Année : 1984
Avec : Angela Lansbury (Jessica Fletcher) William Windom (Doctor Seth Hazlitt) Tom Bosley (Sheriff Amos Tupper) Jerry Orbach (Harry McGraw) Michael Horton (Grady Fletcher) Keith Mitchell (Dennis Stanton) Ron Masak (Sheriff Mort Metzger) Len Cariou (Michael Hagarty) Wayne Rogers (Charlie Garrett)

programme.title: Born and Bred
programme.desc:
Len and Linda's (Peter Gunn, Tracey Childs) first foster child turns out to be a 12-year-old who can't keep out of trouble. The brewery sends a manager to turn the pub into a tourist attraction. Deborah: Jenna Russell.
Année : 1984

programme.title: The Rhapsody
programme.desc:
2023. At the age of ninety-eight, late composer Leo Spellman, a Polish-Canadian Holocaust survivor sets out on a journey toward artistic liberation. Filmmaker David Hoffert presents Spellman's musical masterpiece composed in a German DP camp, and lost for over fifty years. His secret wartime diary is revealed for the first time.
Année : 2023
Réalisation : David Hoffert

programme.title: theZoomer
programme.desc:
A sharp, relevant and intelligent take on the world from a uniquely "Zoomer" aka "Boomer with Zip" point of view.
Année : 2013
